text: Theobalds Grove railway station serves Waltham Cross in Hertfordshire, England. It is on the Seven Sisters branch of the Lea Valley Lines, and train services are provided by London Overground. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Hertfordshire Category:Railway stations opened in 1891 Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia Category:1891 establishments in Europe Category:1890s establishments in England Category:1909 disestablishments Category:1900s disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century disestablishments in England Category:1915 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in England Category:1919 disestablishments Category:1910s disestablishments in Europe Category:1960 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1960s establishments in England
title: Theobalds Grove railway station
